name: 楊濠瞬
objective:
1. 阻抗匹配器
2. 濾波電路
3. 小訊號放大器
4. 弦波訊號產生器
5. 晶體振盪器
6. 混波器
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2: band-pass filter introduction
Week 3: band-pass filter design
Week 4: band-pass filter implementation
Week 5: Project I Measurement
Week 6: low-noise amplifier introduction
Week 7: low-noise amplifier design
Week 8: low-noise amplifier implementation
Week 9: Project II Measurement
Week 10: power amplifier introduction
Week 11: power amplifier design
Week 12: power amplifier implementation
Week 13: Project III Measurement
Week 14: mixer introduction
Week 15: mixer design
Week 16: mixer implementation
Week 17: mixer implementation
Week 18: Project IV Measurement
scorePolicy:
實作一 Project I : 25%
實作二 Project II : 25%
實作三 Project III : 25%
實作四 Project IV : 25%
materials: RF Circuit Design Theory and Applications by Reinhold Ludwig and Pavel Bretchko
